content: 1 puff into ea stitch for 2 stitches then 2 puffs in next repeat 40 st 5 1 puff in ea st 40 st 6 1 puff in ea st for 3 st then 2 puffs in next st repeat 50 st 7 1 puff in ea st for 4 st then 2 puffs in next st repeat 60 st 8 1 puff in ea st for 5 st then 2 puffs in next st repeat 70 st 9 1 puff in ea st 70 st 10 1 puff in each st for 6 st then 2 puffs in next st repeat 80 st 11 to 20 1 puff in ea st 80 st you can work more/less rounds here if you want more/less slouch before starting the first round of the band count back 11 stitches and place a stitch marker - this marks where the the second group of decreases begins wheelie made it crochet puff slouchy page 4 band 1 half_double_crochet in first st half_double_crochet decrease over next 2 st 1 half_double_crochet in ea st for 2 st half_double_crochet decrease over next 2 st work pattern in brackets twice and then 1 half_double_crochet in ea st for next 58 st 1hdc decrease over the marked st and the st after it insert stitch marker then 1 half_double_crochet in ea of the next 2 st half_double_crochet decrease over next 2 st work pattern in brackets twice half_double_crochet in final st of this round 74 st from this point all stitches are camel stitches 2 camhdc in next st 1camhdc decrease over next 2 st work pattern in brackets 3 times then 1 camhdc in ea st for next 57 st right before the marked stitch 1camhdc decrease over next 2 st half_double_crochet in next work pattern in brackets twice then camhdc decrease over final 2 st of round 68 st 3 & 4 1 camhdc in ea st 68 st 5 1 camhdc in ea st for 67 st in final st work a camsc 68 st 6 1 camsc in ea st for 3 st 3 st ** finish with a slip_stitch or an inv join weave in tails sew on button ** the pattern shown in the youtube video does not finish with camscs i added this to the pattern later because finishing with a few single crochets makes the invisible join less noticeable and also lines the end of the beanie up better with the middle of the back of the beanie when you wear it if you prefer you can follow the pattern as per the video just work the 5th round of the band exactly like the 3rd and 4th rounds and skip the 6th round and you re done i hope you love your new beanie if you share photos of your cosy new slouchy on instagram do tag me so i can admire 😃 if you come across any errors or need help with this pattern feel free to get in
